title: Phil Rosenthal On His Hours-Long Lunch With Johnny Carson
description:
"Everybody Loves Raymond" creator Phil Rosenthal delights our host with the story of meeting and talking comedy with one of Stephen’s personal heroes, the late Johnny Carson. Watch the sixth season of his show, “Somebody Feed Phil,” when it premieres on Netflix on October 18th.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
